item.title: Recruitment of Mongol-Tori
item.dc:creator: Ali
item.description: Are you passionate about space exploration and eager to learn new skills? This is your chance to join BRACU Mongol-Tori, our university rover team! Whether you’re from engineering, business, arts, biology, or any other department, there’s a place for you to shine and contribute starting from our dedicated Control or […]
item.content:encoded:
Are you passionate about space exploration and eager to learn new skills? This is your chance to join BRACU Mongol-Tori, our university rover team! Whether you’re from engineering, business, arts, biology, or any other department, there’s a place for you to shine and contribute starting from our dedicated Control or Mechanical team all the way to the new PR and Marketing or the Science and Astrobiology team

You’ll get hands-on experience, collaborate with like minded individuals and get a chance to make friendships that will transcend lifetimes. You will also be able to apply your knowledge in real-world scenarios and competitios. Don’t miss this opportunity to be a part of something extraordinary. Let’s take on Mars together!

If you have any queries send us an email at mongol-tori@bracu.ac.bd (preferable) or send us a message.

Register now and take the first step toward an exciting journey!

Registration link:

https://forms.gle/XP8eSGamrYCotFWS9
